executable.title: Line Marker Registration
executable.description: The Line Marker Registration CLI automatically detects a fiducial marker consisting of multiple lines on a 3D image and register the marker to the image coordinate system. The users can configure the CLI to use their own fiducial marker design by creating a marker configuration file formatted in CSV.
